channel.title: Chaotic Crossbow is using melee!
channel.description: Whenever I attack with my chaotic crossbow it runs up to the NPC and trains melee, I know it isnt a clipping glitch because rune crossbow trains perfectly fine.

item.title: Chaotic Crossbow is using melee!
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Revision? Source? You’re not going to get much help if we don’t know what you’re working with. Every source is unique.

A general reason this is happening: If a weapon isn’t combat, it’s declared elsewhere in a switch statement, which could be in several different files. It would roughly look like this:

case #####: // Item ID
[...] // Random stuff that tells the server that this is a ranged weapon.
break;

Post your revision so I can better help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Chaotic Crossbow is using melee!
item.dc:creator: @webwebwebby webwebwebby
item.description:
@webwebwebby wrote:

One thing you could try is search for rune cross bow ID, and where you see the rune x bow ID cope that code and make it unique to chaotic cross bow, then once it works like the rune cross bow change it to whatever specifics you wish.

Read full topic
